snippet.description:
Noise at Pro Sports Games Can Cause Long Term Hearing Loss
Toegevoegd door tvnportal laatste februari

snippet.title: How A Dirty Office Can Cause Business Loss | NY Brite
snippet.description:
How A Dirty Office Can Cause Business Loss | NY Brite
Toegevoegd door NYBrite laatste februari
http://www.nybrite.com/ - This video titled 'How A Dirty Office Can Cause Business Loss' highlights the effect of dirty offices on business. This video shows the officially dirty places in a typical office. This sets up the background to show the solution- NY Brite, the professional cleaning service which can the office rid of the dirt.

snippet.title: UK Study: The Digital Age May Be Causing Mass Hearing Loss
snippet.description:
UK Study: The Digital Age May Be Causing Mass Hearing Loss
Toegevoegd door OneMinuteNews laatste december
A group of researchers in the UK called the Medical Research Council is conducting a study on mass hearing loss as a result of mp3 players and other sources of digital noise. Is the digital age causing gradual deafness? Currently, 17% of UK adults have hearing loss.Source: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-25416853Take the Sound Test: www.100yearsofamplifiedmusic.org
2 469 views
